data.eml:eml: On Gerridae (Insecta: Heteroptera) from Bhutan, with description of a new species of Onychotrechus Kirkaldy, 1903

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zettel, Herbert, Duc, Tran Anh (2007): On Gerridae (Insecta: Heteroptera) from Bhutan, with description of a new species of Onychotrechus Kirkaldy, 1903. Zootaxa 1467: 43-49, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176609
